summary: REQ-3 (deliver Base64 Slice 1 for the 1024x1024 transparent PNG logo asset) is not implemented in the provided diff. The diff mainly updates/introduces asset inventory/verification/restoration utilities and build verification lists, but does not add the required PNG file under `frontend/public/generated/` nor provide any Base64 slice output. Several unrequested changes add/expand asset verification/restoration infrastructure beyond the single-asset delivery request.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate (or retrieve) the PNG asset `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` (1024×1024, transparent background) and deliver Base64 Slice 1 of the PNG payload as plain text suitable for concatenation with slices 2–4 and a single decode pass.
missing_requirements.reason: No PNG asset file is added under `frontend/public/generated/`, and no Base64 Slice 1 payload is provided anywhere in the diff. The changes only reference the filename in asset lists and verification scripts.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded comprehensive asset inventory documentation ("58 required PNG assets") including `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` and many unrelated assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to deliver a single logo PNG (and Base64 Slice 1), not to document/track dozens of assets.

hallucinated_features.description: Runtime HTTP HEAD-based asset verification listing many required assets across multiple categories.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; non-goal states no UI/route/component changes beyond image asset delivery request, and no runtime verification requirement was specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Asset restoration Node script to ensure `frontend/public/generated/` exists and to manage/validate a complete required asset list.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest scope is delivering the single logo asset and Base64 slice.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded build verification script required PNG list to include the new logo and many other assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to build verification scripts or adding large required asset inventories; only the single logo asset delivery was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state tracking updated with new_feature_requests entry AR-1 marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested deliverable; BuildRequest asked for Base64 Slice 1 and the PNG asset, not metadata/state tracking changes.
